title: Sketchbook Folio, "Three Studies of a Head with Diadem and Braided Hair, after Raphael", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower margin: 29 Rafaello Roma
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three female heads with two upper ones in three quarter view and looking right; lower head in full profile to right. All feature braided hair wound around their heads, and arranged in a kind of diadem.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Three Studies of a Head with Diadem and Braided Hair, after Raphael", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3498.
